alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 18 at 10:47PM EST until November 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 or more inches possible in the most- persistent snow, especially in the northern half of the county. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Crawford county. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect a burst of heavy lake effect snow Saturday night with a cold frontal passage, with bands of locally heavy snow continuing into the day Sunday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
